name: Warcraft 3 Map File
summary: Learn about .W3M files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Maps for the Warcraft III expansion pack use the .W3X extension.

description: A W3M file is a game map used by Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos. It includes terrain, objects, and resources placed within the map. W3M files are included with the game and can be created by players with the Warcraft III World Editor.
